org.cooperari.core

Class CThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.cooperari.core.CThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, CProgramState.CElement, CThreadHandle

    public final class CThread
extends Thread
implements CThreadHandle
    Cooperative thread.
    Since:
    0.2

        Parameters:

        r - Runnable to be executed by the thread.

      • intercept

        public static CThread intercept(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint jp)
        Intercept thread, if a CThread.
        Parameters:
        jp - Join point.
        Returns:
        A CThread if current thread is cooperative, null otherwise.

      • self

        public static CThread self()
        Get current thread object if the thread is cooperative, null otherwise.

        Callers can use this method to determine if they are executing in a cooperative context. Note also that the returned thread may be masking an actual application thread. The latter can be queried by getVirtualizedThread().

        Returns:
        The thread object or null if the thread is non-cooperative.

      • getCState

        public CThreadState getCState()
        Get logical running state of thread.
        Returns:
        The logical running state of the thread.

      • getVirtualState

        public Thread.State getVirtualState()
        Get virtual thread state.
        Returns:
        The virtual thread state.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Check is thread is (logically) running (CRUNNING state).
        Returns:
        true if thread is running.

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Check is thread is (logically) ready to be executed (CREADY state).
        Returns:
        true if thread is ready.

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked()
        Check is thread is blocked (CBLOCKED state).
        Returns:

      • cYield

        public <T> T cYield(COperation<T> op)
        Cooperatively yield (new version).
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of result for operation.
        Parameters:
        op - Operation.
        Returns:
        Result for operation.

      • cResume

        public void cResume()
        Resume the thread after a cooperative yield. This is executed by the cooperative execution engine only. The thread will be allowed to resume and complete the operation for the current yield point.

      • cStop

        public void cStop(Throwable e)
        Order thread to stop.
        Parameters:
        e - Throwable instance.

      • testAndClearInterruptStatus

        public boolean testAndClearInterruptStatus()
        Test and clear interrupt status.
        Returns:
        true if thread was interrupted.

      • testAndClearWakeupEvents

        public CBlockingOperationEvent testAndClearWakeupEvents()
        Test and clear wakeup events. Use this method when spurious wakeups are enabled.
        Returns:
        null, CBlockingOperationEvent.INTERRUPTION_EVENT, or CBlockingOperationEvent.SPURIOUS_WAKEUP_EVENT.

      • triggerInterrupt

        public void triggerInterrupt()
        Trigger interrupt. The request is ignored if the interrupt status is already set.

      • getInterruptStatus

        public boolean getInterruptStatus()
        Get interrupt status.
        Returns:
        Interrupt status of this thread, true if interrupted, false otherwise.

      • enableSpuriousWakeups

        public void enableSpuriousWakeups()
        Enable the possibility of spurious wakeups.

      • triggerSpuriousWakeup

        public void triggerSpuriousWakeup()
        Trigger spurious wakeup. The request is ignored if the thread is not in a blocked state or if the spurious wakeup status is already set.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Get textual representation of the thread state. The method is used for debugging purposes.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Thread
        Returns:
        A string object.
